title: Episode #42: Steve Vladeck and Ryan Goodman on "Just Security"
itunes:title: Episode #42: Steve Vladeck and Ryan Goodman on "Just Security"
itunes:subtitle: Lawfare veteran Steve Vladeck and NYU law professor Ryan Goodman discuss their new national security blog, Just Security--which launches today.
description:
Lawfare veteran Steve Vladeck and NYU law professor Ryan Goodman discuss their new national security blog, Just Security--which launches today.
